tags.name: ItemFieldRestService
tags.description:
REST service to deal with all fields of items. Order of the fields:
  • Basic item fields (indicated by "is a custom field?" = false and "is assigned to a supplier?" = false)
  • Custom item fields (indicated by "is a custom field?" = true and "is assigned to a supplier?" = false)
  • Item fields that are assigned to a supplier (indicated by "is a custom field?" = false and "is assigned to a supplier?" = true)
  • Custom item fields that are assigned to a supplier (indicated by "is a custom field?" = true and "is assigned to a supplier?" = true)

ROLES: service doesn't require specific rights and roles, user just must be AUTHENTICATED.

tags.name: ItemRestService
tags.description:
REST service to deal with shop items.
ROLES: service doesn't require specific rights and roles, user just must be AUTHENTICATED.

tags.name: ItemSearchRestService
tags.description: REST service for searching items by parameters.

tags.name: ItemTypeRestService
tags.description:
REST service to deal with shop item types.
ROLES: service doesn't require specified rights and roles, user just must be AUTHENTICATED.

tags.name: ItemTypeRestServiceV2
tags.description:
REST service to deal with shop item types, version 2.
ROLES: service doesn't require specified rights and roles, user just must be AUTHENTICATED.

tags.name: MenuRestService
tags.description:
REST service to return the left navigation menu.

ROLES: service requires right WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE.

tags.name: OrderHistoryRestService
tags.description: REST service to deal with orders information.

tags.name: OrderListRestService
tags.description: REST service to deal with shop order lists.

tags.name: RoleRestService
tags.description: REST service to return shop user roles.

tags.name: ShoppingCartRestService
tags.description:
REST service for getting shopping cart of current user.
ROLES: service doesn't require specified rights and roles, user just must be AUTHENTICATED.

tags.name: TeaserRestService
tags.description: REST service to deal with shop teasers.

tags.name: TopicPageRestService
tags.description: REST service to deal with shop topic pages.

get.description:
This method retrieves all available catalogue groups as list of short information.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

put.description:
This method updates catalogue group with specified parameters.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

post.description:
This method creates catalogue group with specified parameters.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

201.description: New catalogue group was created successfully

put.description:
This method adds catalogue to catalogue group.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

200.description: Catalogue was added to catalogue group successfully.

delete.description:
This method removes specified catalogue from specified catalogue group.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

200.description: Catalogue was added to catalogue group successfully.

put.description:
This method updates supplier information for specified catalogue group.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

200.description: Supplier of catalogue group was updated successfully.

get.description:
This method retrieves required supplier for specified catalogue group.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

This method returns catalogue group with required identifier.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

delete.description:
This method removes catalogue group with specified identifier.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the catalogue group.

get.description:
This method retrieves all available catalogues.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

put.description:
This method updates catalogue with specified parameters.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

post.description:
This method creates catalogue with specified parameters.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Can be specified, but can be null. Can be specified in multilanguage format: ~{EN-US}EN description~{DE-DE}DE description.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Should be specified and cannot be null. Can be specified in multilanguage format: ~{EN-US}EN label~{DE-DE}DE label.

get.description:
This method returns short catalogues info as list.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of catalogues. Must be => 1, or null.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: First index of catalogues. Must be => 0, or null.

get.description:
This method returns catalogue with required identifier.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

delete.description:
This method deletes catalogue with specified ID.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE

post.description:
This method exports products of catalogue in CSV format.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE or SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CATALOGUE_MANAGE, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

get.description:
This method retrieves all available sub categories of specified parent identifier as list.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

put.description:
This method updates category with specified parameters.

This method creates category with specified parameters.

get.description:

This method deletes category with specified ID.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

get.description:

requestBody.description: new data for the country to update.

Creates a new country.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_COUNTRIES role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_COUNTRIES

This method retrieves the required country.

Creates a new custom field.

get.description:
Gets a custom field by its external field ID.

get.description: Liveness health check resource
Readiness health check resource
Startup health check resource

Retrieves the list of item editor components.
ROLES: service requires one of the following roles: SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_OWN, SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_ALL, SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_OWN, SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_ALL, or SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_ALL, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_OWN, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_ALL, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_OWN

put.description:
Creates a new item editor configuration.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE

post.description:
Creates a new item editor configuration.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE

Creates an exact copy of an item editor configuration.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE

404.description: Item editor configuration with the given ID not found

get.description:
Retrieves a single item editor configuration for the current user.
ROLES: service requires one of the following roles: SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_OWN, SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_ALL, SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_OWN, SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_ALL, or SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_ALL, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_OWN, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_ALL, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_OWN

Retrieves the list of short information about item editor configurations.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE

Retrieves a single item editor configuration.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE

delete.description:
Deletes an item editor configuration.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE role. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE

404.description: Item editor configuration with the given ID not found

409.description: Item editor configuration with the given ID is default

get.description:
Retrieves the list of item editor control definitions.
ROLES: service requires one of the following roles: SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_OWN, SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_ALL, SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_OWN, SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_ALL, or SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_MANAGE_CONFIG_ITEM_EDITOR_PAGE, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_ALL, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_PRODUCT_MANAGE_OWN, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_ALL, WEB_SHOP_SHOP_STOCK_MANAGE_OWN

200.description: Item editor control definitions retrieved successfully

get.description:
This method returns all fields of items that are currently assigned to any item of the given type.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: to use for item field names (optional; defaults to current user language)

200.description: Custom fields of item is returned.

404.description: Custom fields of item are not available.

get.description:
Returns a list of mappings of field technical names to external field IDs,
given a comma-separated list of technical names.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: technicalNames
parameters.description: List of technical names (comma-separated, e.g. technicalname1,technicalname2)

200.description: List of external field ID mappings is returned.

404.description: Some technical names were not found.

get.description:
Returns information about field technical names that are required to display either the item list view
or the item grid view.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

200.description: List of required technical names is returned.

get.description:
Returns a list of mappings of external field IDs to field technical names,
given a comma-separated list of external field IDs.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: externalFieldIds
parameters.description: List of external field IDs (comma-separated, e.g. 1,2)

200.description: List of technical name mappings is returned.

404.description: Some external field IDs were not found.

get.description:
This method gets all item types of the system.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: to use for item type names (optional; defaults to current user language)

get.description:
This method returns all items that are currently assigned to any item of the given type.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specified language. If language is null then system language will be used.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

requestBody.description: ItemRestDto with ID and specified fields.

get.description:

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: language

delete.description:
This method deletes item with specified ID.

get.description:
This method returns bytes of preview image. This method is a proxy to Media Pool rest service.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

parameters.name: generateWatermark

parameters.name: useAlternative
parameters.description: if true alternative preview image will be provided.

get.description:
Returns list of menus to display in left navigation.

delete.description:
This methods removes supplier with specified identifier if it is possible.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_SUPPLIER_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_SUPPLIER_MANAGE

get.description:
This method retrieves all departments (recipients) for supplier.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

Retrieves the list of teaser layouts.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

put.description:
Updates a teaser layout.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

409.description: No current teaser layout would be left after update

post.description:
Creates a new teaser layout.

Contents are copied from the teaser layout immediately before it date-wise, if any. However, any teasers not available at the teaser layout's date are deactivated.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

get.description:
Retrieves the content of the teaser layout active at the specified date. Can return null if there is no teaser layout active at that date.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

parameters.name: at
parameters.description:
Date at which the active teaser layout should be retrieved.
If null, the current date is used.

get.description:
Retrieves the content of a teaser layout by its ID.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

delete.description:
Deletes a teaser layout.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

get.description:
Retrieves a layout's teasers by the layout ID.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

put.description:
Updates a teaser.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

post.description:
Creates a new teaser.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

get.description:
Retrieves the list of common information about teasers for the front page.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

Retrieves a teaser by its ID.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

delete.description:
Deletes a teaser by its ID.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

get.description:
Retrieves all available topic pages.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

put.description:
Updates a topic page.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

409.description: Topic page with this name already exists

post.description:
Creates a topic page with the specified name.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: topic page name in multilanguage format (required)

409.description: Topic page with this name already exists

get.description:
Retrieves common information for all available topic pages.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_BROWSE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_BROWSE

delete.description:
Deletes a topic page.
ROLES: service requires the SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_CONTENT_MANAGE

404.description: Topic page with the given ID not found

409.description: Topic page is assigned to teaser

get.description:
Retrieves all item types in the system.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

put.description:
Creates item type by its identifier.
ROLES: method requires the SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE

409.description: Attempted to change base type while items of this custom type exist.

post.description:
Creates item type by its identifier.
ROLES: method requires the SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE

get.description:
Retrieves short info all item types in the system.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

Retrieves a single item type by its identifier.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ AUTHENTICATED

400.description: Item type identifier is null or less than 1.

delete.description:
Deletes a single item type by its identifier.
ROLES: method requires the SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE

400.description: Item type identifier is null or less than 1.

post.description:
Retrieves a single item type by its identifier.
ROLES: method requires the SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE right. __Security Roles Allowed:__ WEB_SHOP_SHOP_GLOBAL_SETTINGS_MANAGE

ShoppingCartSortRestDto.title: ShoppingCartSortRestDto
ShoppingCartSortRestDto.description:
This DTO describes sorting configuration. It provides also 3 default sorting configurations:
  • ShoppingCartSortDto.EMPTY - {} order of items is equal order on edit shopping cart page
  • ShoppingCartSortDto.DEFAULT - {item_type, asc, case_sensitive},{item_label, asc, case_sensitive},{item_id, asc, case_sensitive}
  • ShoppingCartSortDto.ONLY_LABEL - {item_label, asc, case_sensitive}
